import React, { useContext } from 'react' import JobContext from '../context/Jobs/jobsContext'; const AddJob = () => { const context = useContext(JobContext); const { addJobs } = context; const [jobDetails, setJobDetails] = useState({ jobTitle: '', jobDescription: '', jobCompany: '', jobSalary: '' }); const handlesubmit = () => { } const handleChange = (e) => { setJobDetails({ ...jobDetails, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( <>
) } export default AddJob
